琗字的基本解释

琗
cuì
珠玉的光彩。
文彩相杂。

琗
sè
古同“璱”。

琗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cuì］
［《集韻》取内切，去隊，清。］
(1)珠玉的光采。
(2)通“綷”。文采相杂。

琗字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　琗； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页734第04
【集韻】色櫛切，音瑟。同璱。　又取內切，音倅。珠玉光。【郭璞·江賦】瑤珠怪石琗其表。【註】琗，音子會反。瑱琗，謂文采相雜也。　又思晉切，音信。義同。

琗字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
琗字的起名意思

珠玉的光彩。文彩相杂。

琗

[①]［cuì］
["Jiyun" takes the inside cut, goes to the team, clears. ]
(1) The brilliance of jewels.
(2) Through "綷". Literary talents are mixed.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　琗; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 734 04
[Jiyun] The color is cut, and the sound is serene. Same with Jing.　 Take the inside cut again, the sound. Pearly light. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] The jade beads are strange stones. [Note] Gu, the sound will be reversed. Yuanyan is a mixed literary style.　Thinking about Jinqi again, news. The same meaning.
